title: Smart Data models - Water Consumption Observed schema
description: The Smart Water Meter model captures water consumption, customer side leak alarms and associated flow rate originating from the smart water meters

type.description: Property. It has to be WaterConsumptionObserved. NGSI type

acquisitionStageFailure.description: Property. No inductive response of metering device

alarmFlowPersistence.description: Property. Alarm signifying continuous water use

alarmInProgress.description: Property. Indicates that one or more alarms are in progress

alarmStopsLeaks.description: Property. Alarm signifying the potential for an intermittent leak

alarmTamper.description: Property. Alarm signifying the potential of mechanical tampering with the device

alarmWaterQuality.description: Property. Alarm signifying the potential of backflows occurring

maxFlow.description: Property. Maximum flow rate observed during the last week. Units:'litres/hour'

minFlow.description: Property. Minimum flow rate observed during the last week. Units:'litres/hour'

moduleTampered.description: Property. Removal of module from metering device

persistenceFlowDuration.description: Property. The duration that persistence flow (continuous flow) is recorded by the meter. Text  field showing durations in minutes (m), hours (h) or days (d).

waterConsumption.description: Property. The water meter reading. Note â€“ this is total volume passed through the meter and is therefore a cumulative total at the time. Units:'Cubic meters'
